Entries.default: "You cozy up to the awful vines. I'll find a way around."
"Would it help to water them, I wonder?"
"I'm all for the path of least resistance. And that's going around."
"There another way we can go? I think that vine just shook its fist at me."
"Them vines can be damned good fun in the right setting. This ain't it."
"Those vines have reaped as many souls as I have. Reckon we ought to skirt their reach."
